title: Battle Pass – Year 8 Season 3 – FOR HONOR
description:
The Vikings share legends of Gudmundr and how his shield and sword endure to protect Valkenheim. 

Honor the fallen in the Y8S3 Battle Pass. Get 100 tiers of rewards for all heroes to unlock new weapons and mood effects. Premium rewards include themed outfits, effects, weapons, a battle points boost from completed matches, 12.5K steel, and more. Available during Y8S3 only.
longDescription:
The Vikings share legends of Gudmundr and how his shield and sword endure to protect Valkenheim. Honor the fallen Jarl Gudmundr with a Viking funeral in the Y8S3 Battle Pass. It will give you access to 100 tiers of rewards for all 35 heroes, including:

-1 execution (per hero)
-1 weapon set (per hero)
-1 paired emote (per hero)
-2 battle outfits (per hero)
-2 effects (idle/emote/execution per hero)
-Various customization elements
-A 10% bonus in battle points earned through completed matches
-And more!

The For Honor Y8S3 Battle Pass offer does not add any new benefits to the game if you already own the Y8S3 Battle Bundle.

This Y8S3 Battle Pass is available until December 5, 2024, and is not eligible for refund.
